Package <Unnamed>

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    blockPickUp
    Detect the block and pick up
    ClawDriver
    Controls the opening and closing of the claw
    Correction  
    CorrectionAngel
    Corrects the heading of the Robot
    FindLine
    Light sensor controller/filter
    Ghost
    Simulates a robot travelling through the map
    GridSquare
    Represents one tile on the map
    LCDDisplay
    Derived from the display of LAB2, now has muliple screens
    LightSensorController
    The controller class that takes data from the poller, and filters the data.
    LightSensorPoller
    Polls the color sensor at set intervals
    Localizer
    Will move the robot about the map, analyzing movements and wall locations, will stop once the position of the robot has been determined
    Map
    Map which contains all of the gridSquares
    Navigation
    Navigator for the robot
    Odometer
    Odometer Class gets the tachometer readings from the motors, and calculates the relative position of the robot.
    OdometryCorrection  
    Path
    Path class contains a path of gridSquares and WayPoints to navigate the robot
    Pathfinder
    This class generates a Path when given a start, destination, and map.
    PathTravel
    Travels w/out use of odometer
    Simon
    MAIN RUNNING CLASS
    SquareDriver
    SQUARE DRIVER FROM LAB 2, ONLY FOR TESTING PURPOSES, WILL NOT BE IN FINAL CODE
    UltrasonicController  
    UltrasonicPoller
    This is the Ultrasonic Poller class, which will read data from the sensor at given intervals
    Waypoint
    Waypoint, used by navigator to travel
    WheelDriver
    Controls the motors for the wheels
